author: cnbc.com
title: CTI Industries Corporation to Host Conference Call and Live Webcast to Discuss Year-End and Fourth Quarter 2017 Financial Results
text:
LAKE BARRINGTON, Ill., March 21, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- CTI Industries Corporation (NASDAQ: CTIB) today announced that it will host a conference call and live webcast to discuss 2017 fourth quarter and 2017 year-end financial results. The conference call and webcast will take place on Thursday, March 29, 2018 at 9:00 a.m. Central Time (10:00 a.m. Eastern Time).
To access and/or participate in the conference call, the dial-in telephone number is 866-619-8760. The Conference ID is 8088855. Participants are advised to dial into the call five to ten minutes prior to the starting time to register.
A replay of the conference call will be available from March 29, 2018 through April 5, 2018 by dialing (855) 859-2056. The Conference ID is 8088855.
About CTI Industries Corporation
CTI Industries Corporation, based in suburban Chicago, is one of the leading manufacturers and marketers of foil and latex balloons, develops, produces and markets vacuum sealing systems for household use, produces laminated and printed films for commercial uses and markets home organizing products. CTI markets its products throughout the United States and in a number of other countries.
